A Comprehensive Digital Credential Management Software

1
Analyze and track

Monitor views, social media shares, website clicks, and other metrics to gauge the impact of digital credentials on your learning programs.

2
Automate & reduce effort

Save time and minimize mistakes by automating with our bulk upload feature. Easily upload awardee's data using CSV reducing manual effort and errors.

3
Integrate with your system

CertifyMe seamlessly integrates with your existing LMS and publishing tools, ensuring smooth certificate creation and issuance while preserving your established workflows.

4
WhiteLabel & customize credentials

Elevate your credential branding beyond just logos. With CertifyMe, tailor the entire credential experience to your brand with customizable landing pages, emails, URLs, custom wallet, verification page, showcase directory, and custom widget's.

5
Enable your recipients to share

Transform your certificates and badges into powerful organic referral tools for your learning programs. CertifyMe's 30+ social media sharing features, along with linkedIn, website, and email integration, empower your learners to share their achievements effortlessly with a single click.
